projects.title: Task Reminder Google Chrome Plugin
projects.bodyText:
- A chrome plugin to create reminders for yourself.
 - Get a pop up notification in chrome.
- User can sign up and their reminders will be stored in a **Postgres** databse and they can access them on any browser or they can create local reminders which will use the chrome storage.
- Created a React sign up journey that incorporates stripe billing.

projects.title: Online Islamic Book Library
projects.bodyText:
- A React App for an online islamic library.
 - Deployed to Netlify.

projects.title: Financial Documents API
projects.bodyText: - RESTAPI to create PDF financial documents (Invoices, Receipts and Quotes).

projects.title: Machine Learning Notebooks
projects.bodyText: - Python Jupyter Notebooks on my ML/AI learning path.
